## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have run `npm run lint` and fixed all issues

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on the target platform(s)

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] README.md is updated if needed

### Security & Privacy

- [ ] I have not included any sensitive information (API keys, private keys, etc.)
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] No new security vulnerabilities introduced

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not added unnecessary dependencies
- [ ] New dependencies are properly documented
- [ ] package.json and package-lock.json are in sync

### Database & Migrations

- [ ] Database schema changes include migration scripts
- [ ] Migrations are reversible (have down migrations)
- [ ] Sample data updated if needed

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] My changes do not break existing functionality
- [ ] If breaking changes exist, they are clearly documented
- [ ] Migration guide provided for breaking changes
